Html:
Hey guys,

is there the opportunity to export the sql server inventory to other formats like csv or import the results directly in MSSQL databases?

Thanks in advance!

Hi FuriouZ,
Right now Excel workbooks are the only formatted output option that I've written. The nice thing about PowerShell is that the modules return a PSObject which you can do anything that you please with.

Persistence to other formats is on my long term To-Do list; I just haven't figured out the best way to go about it yet. I'll get there eventually. :-)

Thanks for checking out SQL Power Doc!

--Kendal
